website_summaries.verdict: The top choice if you need a high-performing, powerful shredder and aren't concerned by the high price.
pros: Stands out for being a fast functioning, professional machine that can shred up to 22 sheets of paper at a time
Has a 16-gallon capacity bin and quiet operation
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum, but its performance is worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a piece together box. Did not work as door sensor was broken off obviously prior to shipping but was sold anyway. Had to get fixed through manufacturer. VERY large shredder, too big actually. Have seen smaller, less expensive units do better.
customer_reviews.author: Cp

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: So unhappy with this product. Paid a high price, to only be disappointed. Jams up 80% of the time. This was supposed to be the last shredder I would have to buy. I was wrong. It was expensive, large, giving you the image that it was a heavy duty, commercial like shredder. A HUGE WASTE OF MONEY !!
customer_reviews.author: cwlehman

customer_reviews.title: Shredder arrived in horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: This machine was in horrible condition upon receipt. One wheel was completely broken off. We found small pieces of the machine in the shipping box. There were scratches and cracks around the entire machine. The door wouldn't properly close. We didn't turn the shredder on to see if it even worked. The shredder itself doesn't look like a bad shredder, but would not order again for fear of getting a device in similar condition.
customer_reviews.author: Charlise Washington

customer_reviews.title: AwEsOmE Machine
customer_reviews.text: Our special ed-severe class has started a work-based learning program doing a recycling route for teachers and shredding all the school papers with names, addresses and Id. numbers on them. This shredder has been safe with my students hands who would not normally be able to do jobs independently. It takes CDs, staples and 20 sheets at a time. Its quiet and automatically turns on when you hold paper up to it. The basket is big to catch the shredded materials too. Wonderful Machine!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Eats Paper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shreedie McShreder. This is my favorite office machine. It shredded 10 years of business tax documents and it's licking it's lips for more. Fantastic performance at a not too unreasonable price. Paper clips and staples are eaten with no complaints. Shredie where have been all these years?
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHREDDER EVER.
customer_reviews.text: For a good 5 years of my life i've been using those $20 cheap shredders that break after couple weeks of usage. The cheap ones can shred 20 papers and then stops because of heating issues, which is such a headache to deal with. After doing tons of research on whether investing in an expensive shredder was worth it, i decided to give it a go and buy this one. Boy, was I impressed. This thing shreds hundreds of paper at a time like a beast. Deff worth the price. If you want to save yourself the stress of having to deal with crappy shredders that don't do the job, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuya

customer_reviews.title: I love that the front opens up with a container to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shredder for work. Decent size shredder. I love that the front opens up with a container to put a bag in for the shreddings. Much cleaner to change out with less mess. Nice and quiet. Shreds a decent amount of pages at a time and indicates if you are putting too much in at a time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mossburg

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality cardboard bin/damaged out of box/not durable enough for advertised heavy duty usage.
customer_reviews.text: $789.00 industrial shredder has a carboard bin that appeared damaged out of the box. Item ordered for heavy-duty school use; will not hold up to heavy-duty wear and tear. Poor quality cardboard bin/damaged out of the box/not durable enough for advertised heavy-duty usage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Patrovani

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 2 of these expensive paper shredders in May 2018 for my sons school office and one broke after one stack of papers and now turns in the opposite direction and won’t shred and the second just broke last month and the same thing is happening. It turns in the opposite direction so it won’t shred at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lior Leser

customer_reviews.title: Replacement shredder
customer_reviews.text: Shredder replaced another Fellowes which lasted for 11 years. Easy to use with less noise and more capacity than the one it replaced. Cardboard waste bin is flimsy and a major concern. Purchase price was excessive so shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Hornyak MD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 13 months.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is billed as "Backed by a 2 Year Warranty" on the website, but that is NOT the case. Amazon will not help with the return and the Fellowes, Inc. website that Amazon service sent me to indicates a Limited Warranty for 1 year from the date of purchase. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: The piranha of shredders
customer_reviews.text: If you’re serious about shredding, this is the machine for the job. Credit cards, cd’s and stacks of paper are all shredded with ease
customer_reviews.author: AntBme

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We love this quiet machine. It’s large and quick. It did arrive with a broken wheel. That was quickly corrected.
customer_reviews.author: D. BRAASCH

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a strip cutter, not a cross cut as described. I would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanax8

customer_reviews.title: Shredinator
customer_reviews.text: We have an enormous amount of shredding to do every day. This shredder eats all kinds of stuff including light cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: it works perfectly and we are happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a few weeks in our office and have had to dump the trash bag 3 times so it's gotten plenty of daily use. So far, it works perfectly and we are happy with it. It is quieter than our last beast of a shredder and it looks nice. I will update this if something changes but at this point we'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really is 100% jam proof and continuous duty!  I tested it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! It really is continuous duty and j100% ham proof. I use mine commercial and the entire staff LOVES this thing. A great replacement for you machine that saves staff time by actually working!!! Buy with great confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joe Mesh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is awesome for getting the job done. Let's you know visually whether you're getting close to it's capacity and doesn't jam up. I'm SO DONE with buying crappy shredders.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Item was received with stains, scratches, and dents but was purchased as a new item.
customer_reviews.text: Received Fellowes 225 Ci shredder. There is a 'stain' on the top of the shredder on the right side. It did not come off when cleaned with window cleaner. There is also a small scratch on the left side of the machine, close to the top. The paper bin has been banged up a bit, & has bluish stains in two places on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Frontier Community College

customer_reviews.title: Top grade unit for a great price. No regrets..
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not a cheesy plastic unit. It has great volume of shredded waste holding and comes with introductory oil and bags. Ready to run out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Not continuous
customer_reviews.text: Is not continuous shredding, as stated in the specs. I would have been better of buying two $100 shredder and saving the difference. I never write reviews, but felt cheated on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Antone

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: with high prices of shredding ($35 pro pound) this is the best solution for any office and home Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: annaotremba

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This shredder has been used excessively by many people. It has stood the test of time and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wienandt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty which does the job and should last
customer_reviews.text: Durable and does the job. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MarkHhg9310

customer_reviews.title: Mother of all Shredders!
customer_reviews.text: The mother of all shredders. Bought this for my business. We love it, and use it several times weekly. Had many other shredders before they all wore out jammed constantly or both. This one has not slowed down. Be aware though - this thing is HUGE. Everybody laughed at me when the box arrived it looked like a small refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard box for clippings
customer_reviews.text: This is relatively expensive shredder. I was shocked to find the "basket" that fits in the machine was nothing more than an open-top cardboard box. I am sure this will need to be replaced very soon. Couldn't they have at least used plastic for the basket?
customer_reviews.author: Packing 101

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the office.  Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: This product works good in our office. We find that it will shred 20 thin sheets but not 20 standard copy paper sheets. It is nice because it has a large bin. However the bin is a cardboard box and I do not see this lasting more than a year. They need to upgrade to a plastic bin.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder !
customer_reviews.text: As a way to reduce paper waste in the land fill, I use the shredder to shred all paper, junk mail and card stock.. ie cereal boxes. Then use the shredded paper for bedding for my chickens which ends up in my compost pile. So a win for everybody..
customer_reviews.author: Francis Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: The product died after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: The shredder was wonderful for 2 years. It worked every time with no problems. Then one day, it just kept running and wouldn't cut anything. We tried to have it repaired, but no one we found could fix it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eiland

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty shredder for small business - quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.author: Wildplaces

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly for business out of my home. It is quiet and fast. It does a great job on CDs. It easily handles multiple pages and just keeps on shredding. When it is about to jam, it automatically backs up and keeps on running. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: After researching several brands and sizes our small, 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: After researching several brands and sizes our small, 11 person office, decided the Fellowes 225Ci would meet our needs: handle input volume, confidentiality and has reduced the number of bags used for output. It took 7 days from time of order to receipt of the shredder. By the end of the first day heard back from team members on the difference the machine had made in improving their shredding experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed this for work, as shred service is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for work, as shred service is very pricey. Not only does it work and very quietly I might add, but I've asked to take the bits of paper home to use in the bottom of my rabbit and chinchilla cages.
customer_reviews.author: Brian DeBunce

customer_reviews.title: Big time saver, well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We burned up three of the typical office-store high volume shredders before we got this one. It powers through our shredding without overheating or jamming, and does the job in 1/4 the time of the previous ones (because we don't have to wait for it to cool down from overheating). Big timesaver, and well worth the cost... especially when you spend as much on several lower-priced shredders that burn up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nawrocki

customer_reviews.title: and it has been fantastic, so we got another to meet expanding
customer_reviews.text: we have had one for years, and it has been fantastic, so we got another to meet expanding needs
customer_reviews.author: mmap

customer_reviews.title: Amazing except for the bin
customer_reviews.text: Hate the paper box bin. Wish it was made of something that would last.
customer_reviews.author: Rere-views

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and cut the time it took to shred a large amount in half.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Delcambre DDS

customer_reviews.title: It ought to be for the price, but i it runs continously.
customer_reviews.text: Shredding heaven. What a nice 20 page capacity and removable bags to reduce the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Basemann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever owned. I would recommend this shredder to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Big Lou

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for a medical practice and paid more to get a good one that I thought would last
customer_reviews.text: This product was replaced by Amazon before it had been in use for two month. Now it is one year and one month old and has quit again. I purchased this for a medical practice and paid more to get a good one that I thought would last. Now I have spent over $500.00 and it is not working again. I called a technician to have them look at it for repair and was quoted $300 in travel plus $160.00 per hour. I am very frustrated and thought that Fellowes was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shredder!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My special needs daughter can operate it without any problem at all. It is safe and super quiet, and was a snap to set up and learn to use. The BEST shredder we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Giardina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shredder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy shredder. A bit loud when it shreds but overall excellent.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This shredder performances as described. I am very pleased with this purchase. I have a small business that can have high volume of shredding doing certain times of the year and it has no problem keeping up.
customer_reviews.author: Valinda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORK VERY GOOD AND FAST BEEN THROUGH TWO BIG BOXES OF PAPER SO FAR
customer_reviews.author: wesley burruss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the paper I have to shred. Needed something more than a small household item.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Horwath

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as promised and was easy to put into use
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is being used in a teacher's workroom. There have been no complaints about jamming or any other failures. It arrived as promised and was easy to put into use.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Weigel

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It works great and there is no mess. It has a trash liner in it that is very easy to dump.
customer_reviews.author: Marvell

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our office group. Nice piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No different than the cheap ones - it does NOT do 25 pages at a time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and dented... we tried it but 25 pages NOT!!!! Back it goes
customer_reviews.author: ericknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: looks good and we are happy we purchased it
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than we anticipated for just the two of us BUT it is quiet , does everything as advertised, looks good and we are happy we purchased it. (Haven't had to empty it yet so don't know about the bags)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Graham

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We finally splurged and bought a high-quality (read expensive) shredder and it is worth every penny! Very powerful shredder. Buy the bag liners, too!
customer_reviews.author: LevelAttitude

customer_reviews.title: doing the job
customer_reviews.text: this item has been performing well. It gives us the extra storage sized we needed. time will tell if the jamming problems have been eliminated. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: gregory wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Good product,.. takes a beating I've put stuff in there that should not have been shred :-). A real work horse
customer_reviews.text: Takes a beating, real work horse. I have had others this shredder works great I would recommend to any one
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the powershred works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powershred! The Name Says It All.
customer_reviews.text: It will shred large quantities of paper without any problems. And while capable of shredding small children, it won't, due to the saftey shut-off. It's a great shredder.
customer_reviews.author: J. LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: A "REAL shredder"
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased several units from the Staples, OfficeMAX and Sam's Club. No matter how large a unit you purchase they just don't shred the sheet counts as advertised nor hold up as commercial units. This is a heavy unit that works as the specifications say for not that much more than the "commercial units" at the office supply stores. GREAT UNIT with a GREAT WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes Powershred
customer_reviews.text: Well, we've only had this shredder a few weeks and so far it's been GREAT! So, far we are happy with shredder!
customer_reviews.author: Fenton Area Public Schools

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder for the price, good for any small business. Shipping was fast and actually arrived early. Little assembly required and it has functioned as expected since we plugged it in. Criss cross cut not only gives additional security but increases the capacity of th bag before having to be emptied.
customer_reviews.author: jsilva

customer_reviews.title: ... shred customers paper work for them and it works wonderfully. No jams no problems after hundreds of pounds ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our business to shred customers paper work for them and it works wonderfully. No jams no problems after hundreds of pounds of paper shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best shredder I have ever used it. It very fast, reliable
customer_reviews.text: All our staff liked this shredder. It is very useful. This is one of the best shredder I have ever used it. It very fast, reliable
customer_reviews.author: Sayed Naim Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Often cannot handle 20 pages. If used frequently, it will smoke. Slot is just large enough for 8 1/2" size pages, any larger will fold up and not shred.
customer_reviews.author: Groomy

customer_reviews.title: What's worse is the shredder only runs in reverse regardless of ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of four casters broken upon unboxing. What's worse is the shredder only runs in reverse regardless of button pushed. I am sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great just not as quiet as advertised! I checked it with sound meter.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Witherow

customer_reviews.title: Probably is a very good shredder, but too big for MY use.
customer_reviews.text: The thing is a monster. I just live in my house and don't use it like an office. I ordered a smaller less expensive model. This thing is very heavy and HUGE....
customer_reviews.author: M. Krawitz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder
customer_reviews.text: We've had the shredder for over a month and it performs well. We've had no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lewis

product_meta.title: Fellowes Powershred 225Ci Shredder | 100% Jam Proof, 20-Sheet, Cross-Cut, Commercial Grade | 3825001 model
product_meta.description: Style:ShredderThe Fellowes Powershred 225Ci Cross-Cut Shredder can shred up to 20 sheets of paper per pass into 397 (5/32” x 1-1/2” Security Level P-4) cross-cut particles. This machine also safely shreds CDs/DVDs, credit cards, staples, paper clips and junk mail. Achieve hassle-free shredding with all of the features the 225Ci has to offer. Get three levels of advanced jam prevention with Fellowes 100% Jam Proof System which eliminates paper jams, powers through tough jobs and maximizes productivity. To protect more than your identity, the patented SafeSense Technology is designed with an electronic safety sensor that surrounds the paper entry and automatically disables the shredder when hands touch the paper opening. Also, the 225Ci’s SilentShred Technology and Energy Savings System allow this machine to integrate easily to any environment. With the ability to shred continuously, the 225Ci is ideal for 3-5 users and includes a high volume 16-gallon removable basket. Backed by a worry-free 2-year product and service warranty plus lifetime cutter warranty. 30.75” H x 17.75” W x 17.1” D
feature_bullets: Shreds up to 20 sheets per pass into 5/32” x 1.5” strips | High volume, 16-gallon removable basket with LED bin-full indicator
Shredder dimensions – 17.75” D x 17.13” W x 30.75” H | Weight – 83 lbs. | Voltage – 110V | Shred speed (ft./min) – 14 | Oil refill – Once a month
SafeSense Technology stops shredding when hands touch the paper opening
Can shred Credit Cards, Paper, Paper clips, Staples & CD/DVDs | Separate slot for shredding CDs
Continuous duty motor for non-stop shredding | 100% Jam Proof System eliminates paper jams and powers through tough jobs
This item’s packaging will indicate what is inside and cannot be hidden

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
